title: Secret Diary: A Forbidden Liaisons Erotic Romance
description: Clarissa has been coveting a beautiful antique desk that belonged to an old lady friend, and she finally got her wish when it was given to her after the old lady died. But she realized soon after that she did not only get the desk where she learned how to draw and write when she was a child, but through it, she got to meet beautiful and young Amanda.Amanda lived in 1777, and her secret diary was hidden in a secret compartment in the old desk. And she was very much in love with a handsome gentleman who desired her with all of his heart and soul. Through the diary, Clarissa found out how Amanda and Alexander were able to fight for a forbidden love... how Amanda woke up under Alexander's hands. And how their triumph in the end could still give her a chance at happiness even centuries later. Can't stand the suspense? Download and find out what happens next!READER ADVISORY: HOW PLEASUREFUL DO YOU LIKE YOUR STORIES? This story contains content that some readers may find objectionable. All of the characters are 18 years of age or older.
author: Sandra Ross
